Body:
I made a very simple software, which is for checking time, weather (openweathermap API), and indoor temperature (serial communication with Android).

I used it for several months well. Recently, I got a problem and I cannot solve this one. Please refer below message.

If I set a debugging mode as a my PC like below
column9:
it is working fine.

However
column10: if I set a debugging mode as my raspberry pi like below
column11:
it shows the above pop-up message.

For me
column12:
the error message is too ambiguous and I am not sure what to do. (I can access my raspberry pi with IoT Dashboard)

"

Body:
You should change the 'Local Machine' to 'Remote Machine'.

This article shows how to deploy and debug your application is straightforward with Visual Studio.

In addition
column9: i'm confused about that when solution platform is ARM
column10:
there will be no 'Local Machine' item in the target device list by default.My Visual Studio is 2017.15.6.2.

"
